tourguide.service

Class RewardsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourguide.service.RewardsService

  • @Service
public class RewardsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service used to calculate the rewards of the user.
    It also permit to calculate the distance between two locations.
    The getRewardPoints methods permit to get the amount of point that an attraction give.

      RewardsService(gpsUtil.GpsUtil gpsUtil, rewardCentral.RewardCentral rewardCentral) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateRewards(User user)
      calculateRewards is used to add an UserReward to the user who visited a location.
      double getDistance(gpsUtil.location.Location loc1, gpsUtil.location.Location loc2)
      getDistance return the distance between two locations in nautical miles.
      int getRewardPoints(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction, User user)
      getRewardPoints is used to get the points rewarded by visiting a specific attraction.
      boolean isWithinAttractionProximity(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction, gpsUtil.location.Location location)
      isWithinAttractionProximity is used to know if the distance between the attraction and the location of the user is smaller than the attractionProximityRange which is a variable set at the class field.
      boolean nearAttraction(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation, gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction)
      nearAttraction is used to know if the distance between the visited location and the attraction is smaller than the proximity buffer which is a variable set at the class field.

      • isWithinAttractionProximity

        public boolean isWithinAttractionProximity(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction,
                                           gpsUtil.location.Location location)
        isWithinAttractionProximity is used to know if the distance between the attraction and the location of the user is smaller than the attractionProximityRange which is a variable set at the class field.
        Parameters:
        attraction -
        location -
        Returns:
        true, if the user distance from the attraction location is less than the attractionProximityRange.

      • nearAttraction

        public boolean nearAttraction(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation,
                              gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction)
        nearAttraction is used to know if the distance between the visited location and the attraction is smaller than the proximity buffer which is a variable set at the class field.
        Parameters:
        visitedLocation -
        attraction -
        Returns:
        true if the distance is smaller than the proximity buffer, false otherwise.

      • getRewardPoints

        public int getRewardPoints(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction,
                           User user)
        getRewardPoints is used to get the points rewarded by visiting a specific attraction.
        Parameters:
        attraction - : visited
        user - : who have visited the attraction
        Returns:
        int : the points rewarded
